family.name: SIC24AD
family.comment: The SIC24AD can be programmed in the usual way

label.label: Address for optional switch throw/close messages

display.tooltip: Required for Sw Throw/Close Messages
Use for special logic

label.label: Send switch throw messags on logic cell true

display.tooltip: Use for special logic

label.label: Send switch close message on logic cell false
Send primary input state at Digitrax interrogation request

display.tooltip: This does not effect output control of the logic cells

label.label: Use common cathode LEDs on all outputs

display.tooltip: Required for ops mode (on the main programming)
Sets the Ops Mode address

label.label: This is the same as a Loco address
The Custom Programmer format is recommended
